### **Topics:**

* \[Aabid Sofi\] \- Fix issues with organization selection not respected on workspaces page and modal

Any takers?  
  * Action Items:   
    * Add it in the newcomers weekly agenda   
* \[Lee Calcote\]: Discussion of “[overly permissive RBAC configuration](https://groups.google.com/a/meshery.dev/g/security/c/kPJoIyI39fk/m/mI2M9dztAQAJ)” security vulnerability report. Present and review proposed changes.   
  * Use of escalate/bind as a function of Meshery Model registration and enablement via the \`status\` property.  
  * Impersonation \+ Per-Object ServiceAccount Delegation  
* \[Raunak Madan\]: Review of PR [\#493](https://github.com/meshery/meshsync/pull/493)   
  * Adds integration test where meshsync handles ReSync request and publishes cluster data back
